reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made and comfortable, with one noting it tucks nicely into jeans. Customers like the stretchiness of the fabric.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars very fitted sweater.
items.body: This is a great basic sweater. soft ribbed fabric. it is veeery form fitting, so you can size up if you need to. Read more
items.author: r.f.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality knit top
items.body: This is a comfortable sweater style T top. It has substantial thickness to cover undergarment. Close fitting. Best to order up one size if you prefer a no-cling fit. Read more
items.author: Sharon A Schwartz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great!
items.body: Love it! I love the fabric, it feels like it’ll last, love the fit and that it’s well made. This is the 3rd piece I’ve ordered from Zesica and I’m really satisfied with all of them, great quality and value! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Classic Knit Top !
items.body: I'm very happy with these fine ribbed knit tops. Nice classic staple for the wardrobe. I ordered black, navy + coffee. The fabric is good quality + of medium thickness. The fabric/style is made to hug the body. They are stretchy, but hold their shape. I ordered 1 size up for this reason + they fit nicely. I'm returning the coffee color because the shade does not look well on me. Nice choice of colors. Read more
items.author: RKR

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unexpectedly obsessed
items.body: The media could not be loaded. So I love this top! The material is lightweight, but I tried the white on with a black bra and I couldn't see through it. Also, the size out of the package reminded me of those shirts in the early 2000s that looked like they were made for a doll, but stretched like crazy. I've been pretty self conscious of my torso since having my daughter, and while this was fitted, it wasn't tight. In other words, I didn't feel like a sausage! There's the perfect amount of stretch! I did size down after reading reviews. I'm mostly in Large these days, but I ordered medium and it's great! The perfect length on my torso which is a little longer for my height, but I'll likely tuck it in. The sleeves are a little long, but definitely not a deal breaker. I may end up ordering more colors! Read more
items.author: Michelle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous sweaters
items.body: I’ve been looking for this style of sweater for a long time. There classic style goes wonderfully with the wide selection of colors. These sweater fit well , are soft and comfy, they wash up beautifully. I’ve bought 6 different colors, the only one I returned was the brown, not a very attractive color brown. Read more
items.author: LovinLife

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice sweater but runs small...buy a size up.
items.body: I love this sweater. In fact, I have one in white, black and light blue. They're soft and nice to wear, not scratchy at all. Caution: this sweater is very form fitting and I sent the first one back and reordered it a size larger. I usually wear a small (I'm 5'5" and 114 lbs) but the medium is a much nicer fit IMO. It's still form fitting but not tight, if you know what I mean. I highly recommend! Read more
items.author: jean

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Eh, Not Returning but Don’t Recommend
items.body: It’s okay; the black wasn’t good quality Read more
items.author: Ashley

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky, Fuchsia, Apricot, Dim, Rose, Black, Mocha, Coffee, Darkgreen, Navy, Almond, Pink, White, Darkblue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
